Not everyone in the world is thinking about Americans when they do this stuff. There are 4x as many people in India as there are in the US. I'm sure none of them care if there are English subtitles or not.
To be constructive: Try google-ing "total recall 2012 english subtitles" if nothing comes up, wait a day, look here again, then search again.
Better to wait for EN version than try to find subtitles. Or you can start with hindi or go to ... cinema :)

maybe ,not all americans are racist. i am from europe and lived in the usa and all over the world. india , is a disaster ready to happen . they mostly live in dump, they are too many, because they have too many kids, cause of religion and stupidity. they have no clues what the environment is. pollution is surrounding them. they have no notion of what mother earth is.
they rather starve to death than eating a sacred cow. again , yes , i understand their belief , but it is based on superstition .
not so great of a country.
need to have less people and then , they will do better . they rather have their population moving to western civilization. and to them , we are so egocentric etc...
you got the picture. i could go on.
yes, i generalize, but they are so many . the universe is definitely small to them, and their mind is so close. if only they could look up. 
but that fact is called racism .

Keep hating Americans! I'm not apologizing for anything! The guy asked a simple question about subtitles and the trolls come out of the wood work. Hitler, Stalin, Napoleon, Mussolini, the Crusades, the colonization of America, Africa, Southeast Asia, Middle East! How many Irish did the British kill this year? The political and religious persecution of your citizens. You treated your people like trash. Then you threw out your trash and we took them in and made a POWER HOUSE NATION! You're all so high and mighty when it comes to trashing American's yet you forget who started all the bullshit in the first place. We're just cleaning up the mess you fucks started in the first place. Fuck you Euro trash fucks. We should of let Hitler run rough shot all over Europe before we defeated him.
